sentences.sContent: Two cargo trains slammed together at a rail intersection southwest of Cape Girardeau, derailing cars that then struck the support columns of a highway overpass.
sentences.sContent_eng: Two cargo trains slammed together at a rail intersection southwest of Cape Girardeau, derailing cars that then struck the support columns of a highway overpass.
sentences.sCn: 两辆货运火车在开普吉拉多西南部的铁路交叉口发生碰撞，部分车厢脱轨，并撞毁了高速公路天桥的支撑柱。

remMethod.val: over(在…上) ＋ pass(通过) → 在…上通过 → 立交桥

trans.tranOther: a structure like a bridge that allows one road to go over another road
